item.title: Version 0.9.8.9
item.description:
New Features

  • Added support for daily feed notifications
  • Familiarity added to contact profiles and profile cards
  • Feed links now trigger assistant to write messages and emails

Enhancements

  • Updated models for better responses
  • Fixed agent tone and removed paragraph formatting
  • Typeahead now scrollable with more results
  • Fixed residual LinkedIn enrichment
  • Improved celebrations prompt in feed
  • Settings UI cleanup

Bug Fixes

  • Improved resilience of answer generation
  • Fixed latest pack version download issue
  • Edge conditions handled in pydantic class
  • Fixes for update regressions
  • Preserved newlines in input without premature submission
  • Fixed crash in settings window and onboarding logic
  • Fixed broken notifications and other code warnings

Documentation & Technical

  • New Privacy and Terms of Service pages
  • Support added for environment observability
  • GitHub action updated, old code removed, minor check fixes

item.title: Version 0.9.8.8
item.description:
Feed Customization & Settings:

  • Create your perfect information feed with new customization settings
  • Control what appears in your upcoming feed with easy toggles
  • Configure your experience with comprehensive settings panel
  • Customize your agent persona to match your personal style

Improved App Experience:

  • Automatic app update checks every 3 hours
  • Refreshed loading window for a smoother startup experience
  • Feed automatically updates after contact sync

Bug Fixes & Improvements:

  • Fixed issues with undo functionality
  • Improved enrichment logs for better tracking
  • Resolved agent persona update issues
  • Fixed field pack structure and added missing columns
  • Corrected copy functionality to ensure data integrity

item.title: Version 0.9.8.5.2
item.description:
Design Updates:

  • Fresh new app icon reflecting our evolving brand identity
  • Improved visual feedback during operations

Performance Enhancements:

  • Answers now stream in real-time with processing state updates
  • Integrated UI callbacks for smoother user experience
  • Resolved rate limiting issues for improved performance

Bug Fixes:

  • Enhanced validation error handling (#136)
  • Added verification for existing enrichments (#272)
  • Implemented UI state feedback system (#259)
  • Fixed rate limiting performance issues (#330)
